name: Blacksmithery (Tudypie, The BlindEye)
description:
Note:  If the game runs poorly in the browser or the sensitivity is broken please consider downloading it down below! The game can also contain some bugs! We are sorry.

Game Info

Blacksmithery is a game where you run your own blacksmith shop. You will have to serve the customers by providing them the tools or items they request. You will join different parts to make items.

Really casual game with cute low poly graphics :D

Controls

wasd - Move

space - Jump

e - Interact / Pickup / Drop

f - Craft

esc - Pause

Credits

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 by Tudypie and The BlindEye.

Tudypie's Twitter: tudypie1

The BlindEye's Twitter: BlindeyeThe

Please leave a comment providing us feedback if you enjoyed the game :) Have fun!
